other_tests.findings: The liver is diffusely echogenic with a smooth contour. No focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. No ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. The common hepatic duct (CHD) measures 5 mm. The gallbladder is filled with sludge and stones which are mobile. The pancreas is not well visualized, largely obscured by overlying bowel gas. Limited views of the right kidney show no hydronephrosis. Visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
